summary.para: Acts as the entry point for creating an object.

param.name: printerName
param.para: The name of the target printer.

param.name: jobName
param.para: The name to apply to the job.
Note Job name strings longer than 63 characters will be truncated to 63 characters and a terminating NULL.

param.name: jobOutputStream
param.para: The job content. The application must set the seek pointer to the beginning before specifying the job output stream.

param.name: jobPrintTicketStream
param.para: A pointer to the IStream interface that is used by the caller to write the job-level print ticket that will be associated with this job.

returns.para: If the CreateDocumentPackageTargetForPrintJob method completes successfully, it returns an S_OK. Otherwise it returns the appropriate HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Used with for starting a print job.
